column1: lucy jane smith| lucy jane smith. born: january 30
column3: 2015 durham mrs. lucy jane colclough smith
column5: daughter of the late willie carl and maude lucy hall colclough
column6: died wednesday night at duke regional hospital. mrs. smith was born and raised in the nelson community of durham county
column7: where she was educated in the durham county schools. upon graduation
column8: she attended croft business school. for several years she was employed with public service company of nc as a secretary. she enjoyed gardening and cooking and was a long time member of cedar fork baptist church. mrs. smith is survived by her husband
column11: brenda j. smith of durham; brother
column17: nc; and many nieces and nephews. a memorial service will be held on saturday
column19: 2015 at 2:00 pm in the howerton & bryan funeral chapel. burial will follow at woodlawn memorial park. officiating will be the rev. forest gale. the family will receive visitors prior to the service
